name: Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team
author: HocWP Team

sections.description:
Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team is a plugin that allows to load Twitter Bootstrap and Font Awesome on your WordPress site.

Current Versions

  • Bootstrap: 3.3.7
  • Font Awesome: 4.7.0

Translations

  • English
  • Vietnamese

Updates

Updates to the plugin will be posted on www.hocwp.net and the Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team will always link to the newest version.
sections.installation:
Install this plugin from your WordPress site Dashboard or follow these steps below:

  1. Download plugin from WordPress Plugins directory and extract it.
  2. Upload the sb-tbfa folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.

1, 2, 3 you are done.
sections.faq:
Please visit homepage for more details.

Installation Instructions

Install this plugin from your WordPress site Dashboard or follow these steps below:

  1. Download plugin from WordPress Plugins directory and extract it.
  2. Upload the sb-tbfa folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.

1, 2, 3 you are done.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Change name from SB TBFA to Bootstrap and Font Awesome by HocWP Team.
  • Update Bootstrap 3.3.7.
  • Update Font Awesome 4.7.0.

1.1.0

  • Stop using SB Plugins if current theme doesn’t support.

1.0.9

  • Update check core valid version.

1.0.8

  • Tested up to WordPress 4.1.1 version.
  • Add function to check core required version.
  • Re-struct SB TBFA plugin.

1.0.7

  • Update Font Awesome 4.3.0.
  • Update Twitter Bootstrap 3.3.2.

1.0.6

  • Tested up to WordPress 4.1 version.
  • Add screenshot.

1.0.5

  • Update to Twitter Bootstrap version 3.3.1.
  • Update check core functions.

1.0.4

  • Update check core function.

1.0.3

  • Update new check core functions.

1.0.2

  • Update: New options key.

1.0.1

  • New: Use functions from SB Core plugin.

1.0.0

  • First release of this plugin.
